Author: GirlWearingMyDress
Text: Honestly, I think orthorexia and medical bulimia (diabulimia, CF not taking enzymes) are the most insidious and hardest eating disorders. People overlook them and make excuses that you donâ€™t have with other eating disorders.

Author: lemonye
Text: Hey, you can message me! I struggle with this as well, although i've not become uw from it, at least not yet. It's more of an obsession with being "clean" and perfect for me, and following my rules for as long as possible... but everything you say I relate to so hard, and the ducking anxiety that comes after eating just something oily or salty... it lasts for days. It's just the worst. I don't think I'll ever become normal again either, I don't really want to at this point :/
